title: PAX Aus 2016
body: Is Riot Games going to be at PAX Aus this year? if so would there be a booth there or just the panel?

replies.body:
Hey,

This year we're focusing on the panels and how we can share them for people that can't make it to Melbourne. Some of the panels will be streamed live, others will be available after the event as VODs.

You can check out the schedule here: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/riot-panels-coming-pax-australia

There will not be a booth on the main floor like there was a few years ago.
So people that do go to Pax won't get anything good? Because I went to pax this year, was pretty good but would of liked to see more league. Or something players got for going to Pax.
